tool_description: Calculates the age of backups and classifies them into retention categories based on current time and backup creation timestamps.

reference_time.description: Reference time for age calculations (ISO 8601 format)

timezone.description: Timezone for time calculations (e.g., UTC, America/New_York)

error_messages: Invalid backup metadata format: Each metadata string must follow format 'path|size|created_time|db_type|backup_type'.
Invalid reference time: Provide reference_time in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
Invalid timezone: Use a valid timezone identifier (e.g., UTC, America/New_York).
Backup metadata limit exceeded: Maximum 10000 backup entries allowed per calculation.
usage: Provide backup_metadata array with backup information. Optionally specify reference_time for calculations and timezone for proper time handling.

backup_ages.description: Age information for each backup in format: path|age_days|age_category

age_distribution.description: Distribution summary showing count of backups in each age category

calculation_summary.description: Summary of age calculation results and statistics
